original_text: At the king’s command, the men who had falsely accused Daniel were brought in and thrown into the lions’ den, along with their wives and children. And before they reached the floor of the den, the lions overpowered them and crushed all their bones.
korean_text: 왕이 말하여 다니엘을 참소한 사람들을 끌어오게 하고 그들을 그들의 처자들과 함께 사자 굴에 던져 넣게 하였더니 그들이 굴 바닥에 닿기도 전에 사자들이 곧 그들을 움켜서 그 뼈까지도 부서뜨렸더라

sentences.original_text: the men who had falsely accused Daniel
and thrown into the lions' den
along with their wives and children
And before they reached the floor of the den
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 굴의 바닥에 닿기 전에
